title: 92/528/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 November 1992 approving the programmes concerning bonamiosis and marteiliosis submitted by the United Kingdom (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 9 November 1992  approving the programmes concerning bonamiosis and marteiliosis submitted by the United Kingdom  (92/528/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme concerning bonamiosis and marteiliosis for Great Britain, submitted by the United Kingdom, is hereby approved.
The programme concerning bonamiosis and marteiliosis for Northern Ireland, submitted by the United Kingdom, is hereby approved.
The United Kingdom shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with the programmes referred to in Articles 1 and 2 by 1 January 1993.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 November 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 46, 19. 2. 1991, p. 1.
